# Aadish

Aadish is an advanced and highly capable AI assistant module for Python. It provides a simple interface to interact with various AI models via API.

## Installation

```sh
pip install aadish
```

## Usage

```python
import aadish

aadish.aadish("Hello, Aadish!")
```

## Features
- Multiple AI models
- Interactive chat
- Customizable system prompt
